input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Gender has a direct effect on treatment and peanut allergy. Treatment has a direct effect on peanut allergy. The overall probability of receives treatment is 40%. The probability of receives no treatment and being allergic to peanuts is 26%. The probability of receives treatment and being allergic to peanuts is 24%. Is the chance of being allergic to peanuts smaller when observing receives treatment?
